description:
Tora is enraptured by the taste of canned crab. He sets out with Nora to find a rumored paradise where there`s all-you-can-eat canned crab, but they end up fighting and going their separate ways. All alone, Tora wanders onto the grounds of a mansion where he finds a can of crab, but there`s an unknown creature there who`s imprisoning cats!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: パラダイス・オブ・カニカン
